test.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? 'hello' : 'world')
SELECT count() FROM numbers(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? 'hello' : '')
SELECT count() FROM numbers(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? toFixedString('hello', 5) : toFixedString('world', 5))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? '' : toFixedString('world', 5))
